reset.title: Resetting password will reset your cySync app do you want to proceed?
reset.description: This will erase all your data on your cySync app. Note this will not result in loss of assets

welcome.title: Welcome to cySync App
welcome.byProceeding: By proceeding, you accept Cypherock's ${termsOfUse} and ${privacyPolicy}

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Track your Crypto assets across Metamask, Ledger and any other wallet you own

history.title: History
history.description: View your past transaction history and get notified whenever there is a transaction initiated from your Cypherock X2

receive.title: Receive
receive.description: Receive your Crypto assets directly into your Cypherock X2. On the Go!

scan.title: Sync QR from Desktop App
description: Make sure you have bought a Cypherock X1 and have it already setup before scanning
On your cySync desktop app, Go to Settings > General > Sync cySync with Mobile App

permission.title: Camera permission required
permission.description: Camera access is required to scan the QR code and sync with your cySync desktop app. Without this access, the sync process will not work

alert.title: Camera Access Required
alert.description: This feature requires camera access. You can enable it from your device settings.

blePermission.title: Bluetooth permission required
blePermission.description:
Please provide bluetooth access.
Without the bluetooth access you will not be able to pair with Cypherock X2.

alert.title: Bluetooth Permission Required
alert.description: Without Bluetooth access, you cannot pair with Cypherock X2.

bleScan.title: Looking for Cypherock X2…
bleScan.description: Ensure your Cypherock X2 is powered on, unlocked, and near your phone.
bleScan.noDevices: No nearby devices found. Make sure Cypherock X2 is on and in range.

authentication.title: Device Authentication and OS update check
authentication.description: This ensures your Cypherock X2 is an authentic, secure device and is running the latest firmware version.
authentication.permission_description: Tap on “Allow” in your Cypherock X2 to start Authenticity Check

checkUpdate.title: Cypherock X2 OS is updated
checkUpdate.updateCheck: Please wait while we authenticate the device. This process may take a few moments.
checkUpdate.failed: Your Cypherock X2 is not Authentic

cardAuthentication.title: Card Authentication
cardAuthentication.description: Tap your cards below the X2 device

appStore.title: App Store
appStore.description: Choose the apps you want to add

info.title: Your Desktop and Mobile Apps must be synced manually
info.description: cySync App stores your data locally. If you update your coins/accounts on your desktop app, you will need to do the same on your mobile app

newPassword.description: Create a strong password with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols

success.title: New Password added successfully
success.subTitle: You can now use your new password to log in

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Receive your Crypto assets directly into your Cypherock X2. On the Go!

allSet.title: You are all set to go!

scan.alignQrCode: Align QR code to fill inside the frame

messageBox.warning: Note: There can be more than one QR code to scan

loading.description: Syncing in progress... Please stay on this screen and keep your display on until the process is complete

noAccount.title: Nothing here yet!
noAccount.subTitle: We couldn't find anything. Try scanning the QR code on your desktop  again

chooseWallet.title: Choose a wallet to receive crypto in

chooseAccount.title: Choose a crypto you want to receive

messageBox.danger: This Receive Address was NOT VERIFIED by the device. Use it at your own risk or verify address using cySync desktop app

shared.noAccounts: No accounts found in this wallet!

socials.title: Stay in touch with Cypherock
socials.description: Announcements can be found in our blog

newPassword.description: Create a strong password with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols

inputs.description: Create a strong password with a mix of letters, numbers and symbols

removePassword.title: Remove Password?
removePassword.description: Are you sure you want to remove the password?
